TopicTitle: How do I change the 6 hour delay on background drilling for the 'Drill-O-Matic Junior' Mining Excavator?

Articles.Content:
I've tried searching for the answer on forums without any success.

For the 'Drill-O-Matic Junior' Mining Excavator the Practical Details section on the wiki says as follows: 

To have the drill run "in the background" (so you don't need to watch it produce ore), you need to leave it alone for more than 6 hours. If you switch focus back to the craft with the drill before 6 hours have passed, the drill will retroactively stop.

Does anyone know of a way to change or remove that value by editing some config file somewhere? I'm running 1.2.2 if that makes any difference. I just don't understand why there's a delay in the first place!

Not sure if this should've been posted in the Gameplay Questions or over here...

I don't know why (or even if) they have the required time for the first 6 hours, but the reason it's there at all is so if you come back to your base after a year it only has to run the simulation 400-odd times, not millions if it was every second.

Note: It's not a "6 hour delay" it's a "6 hour period." If you leave the ship for 0-5.9 hours, you get nothing (if the Wiki's correct). If you leave it for 6-11.9, you get 6 hours of drilling. If you leave it for 12-17.9, you get 12 hours of drilling. Etc.
